tagline: visualizations for your project structure and lines of code
body:
liofco - nice visualization for your project
============================================

what
----

a program that generates graphics from your project structure using d3

why
---

I like to view my code in different ways

who
---

marianoguerra

how
---

for now run:

`./liofco.py path/to/your/code > map.html`

example
-------

see [emesene project example](http://marianoguerra.github.com/emesene.html)

FAQ
---

Q: the script is pretty basic

A: yep

also, that's not a question

pull requests accepted ;)

what I would like *you* to do
-----------------------------

* argparse to set template to use, languages to accept, patterns to ignore etc
* more visualization options (see d3 examples for "inspiration")

license
-------

MIT + optional beer for the creator
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Liofco
